description:
If you own an audio interface or just got one, it's time to step up your game. In this course you'll learn how to set up and record on your audio interface. You will also learn how to utilize effects to further improve your recordings.


The end goal of the day is so you'll be able to produce world class recordings from your home. With proper setup training, recording and an over-the-shoulder training of using effects you'll be producing high quality audio at the end of this course.

What Materials Are Included?

Over 50 minutes of course content
Ask questions anytime and get it answered, fast.

Why Take The Course?

Whether you're a singer-songwriter, home studio owner, producer or DJ you'd want one thing. BETTER sound. In this course you'll be taught to utilize your audio interface from setting up, recording and editing to get commercial quality sound.

If you want better sound. Grab the course and dig in.
title: Using & Recording On The Audio Interface Like A Pro
